summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Thirty-third Avenue North, from East Madison Street to East Mercer Street; East Mercer Street, from Thirty-second Avenue North to Thirty-third Avenue North; Thirty-second Avenue North, from East Madison Street to East Mercer Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same and by the construction of wooden curbs and gutters and all necessary drains and the adjusting of all manholes and other appurtenances, in accordance with Resolution No. 1712 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
